name: Boss Battle (GDuath)
description:
Contribution to the TIPS Summer Game Jam 2021. 

Your final day at the office before your 4-week summer vacation - don't let any last-minute assignments ruin your mood! Avoid your boss (and jealous colleagues) at all costs, or you may end up spending your summer in meetings instead of the pool.

  • Try to make it till 5p.m. without alerting your boss
  • Score Procrastination Points in various activity areas around the office
  • Try to beat your own highscore and have fun!
